description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight the space pirates on five planets by yourself or with a friend.  Use five different weapon systems to defeat them.  It is your duty to make the universe safe again!
description.short: Fight the space pirates on five planets by yourself or with a friend.  Use five different weapon systems to defeat them.  It is your duty to make the universe safe again!
